metadata.synopsis: Sarevok has a crime reaction to a party member trying to free Valeria from her chains at the Murder Tribunal/Blood Baptism.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Use "oe MT_Baptism", then use "oe MT_Court" to teleport to the courtroom.- Walk to your right into the abattoir, where Valeria is chained by a blood pool.- Unlock the chain or just try to use it. If Sarevok can see this, he will say this AD as combat starts.

0.speaker: Sarevok Anchev
0.text: Miserable worm. You will plead for death before the end.
